resources.string: Checking your license for this game. Please be patient while we connect to our servers for validation.

Your license has been validated.

PLAY NOW
We cannot verify your license for this game. An Internet connection is required. Please TRY AGAIN or consult our HELP page.
Your license for this game does not appear to be valid. Please read our HELP section.

HELP

To validate your game you must be connected to the Internet (Mobile Network (GPRS) or Wi-Fi).

The license is for your phone only, you cannot install the game on another phone.

If you have problems please consult our CUSTOMER SERVICE.
You can choose between Wi-Fi and the Optus network to download this game. There are no data charges for downloading this game on the Optus network.
